function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Sars-cov-2 can persist on fomite surfaces for 3-7 days in indoor environments, leading to potential transmission of the virus.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close-contact aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 is likely in confined, crowded, and poorly ventilated indoor environments, increasing the risk of contagion.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate preventive measures in indoor environments can lead to exposure to the virus through close contact, respiratory droplets, and fomite transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in closed spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded spaces with many people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of air-conditioning and ventilation systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of scientific certainty in evaluating indoor environmental quality control","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through air and environmental compartments such as water, soils, and waste water","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in sewage waters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complicated sample handling in the laboratory for pcr testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of current disinfection technologies on treating the virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density and mobility in jakarta contribute to fast transmission of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High association of covid-19 infections with air pollution in cities, particularly those exceeding pollution limits.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Weakened defenses in regions with poor air quality due to chronic exposure to atmospheric pollution, particularly affecting vulnerable groups like the elderly.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improvement of air quality in barcelona, spain, under lockdown measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of urban air pollution due to lockdown measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between no2 levels and covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of pollen on covid-19 infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pollen acting as a ’firewall’ for flu-like viruses, potentially impacting the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sewage as an indicator of the scale of infection, including covid-19, and the development of waste-based epidemiology wbe methods.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of paper sensor devices for rapid diagnosis of pathogens in untreated wastewater samples, including the use of pcr and paper-based devices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of viruses in sewage and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of viruses in water and sewage","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fecal transmission routes and aerosol formation during wastewater treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible airborne transmission of covid-19 in patient rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of supply chain for critical ppe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on disinfection using chlorine-containing substances","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate evaluation of drug therapies for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate evaluation of traditional medicinal plants for covid-19 treatment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of unproven and potentially unsafe treatments for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation and confusion about the efficacy of drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed development and evaluation of safe and effective treatments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 as a global threat","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in untreated wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 in sewage and wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient comprehensive surveillance of the environment through air and water","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of rapid and on-site detection of covid-19 in sewage waters and humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on assumptions for modeling daily excretion rates in human stool samples","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Direct contact with wastewater containing microorganisms","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate supply of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global shortage of essential medical supplies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity of pcr determination","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variety of concentration methods for wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in untreated wastewaters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of pcr-based diagnosis in low sanitation countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in sars-cov-2 genetic loading in wastewater corresponding to active covid-19 cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on qpcr as the method of choice for detecting sars-cov-2 in wastewater.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on a single measurement solution for the rapid detection of covid-19 in sewage waters and humans.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation to pcr-based methods for virus concentration and detection in wastewater.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
